test.create_query: create table test_orc_fpd ( a Nullable(Int64), b Nullable(String) ) Engine=File(ORC)
test.fill_query: insert into test_orc_fpd select number as a, cast(number as String) as b from numbers(100000000)
test.query: select a % 10, length(b) % 10, count(1) from test_orc_fpd where a > 90000000 group by a % 10, length(b) % 10 settings input_format_orc_filter_push_down = 0
select a % 10, length(b) % 10, count(1) from test_orc_fpd where a > 90000000 group by a % 10, length(b) % 10 settings input_format_orc_filter_push_down = 1
select a % 10, length(b) % 10, count(1) from test_orc_fpd where a in (90000000, 1000) group by a % 10, length(b) % 10 settings input_format_orc_filter_push_down = 0
select a % 10, length(b) % 10, count(1) from test_orc_fpd where a in (90000000, 1000) group by a % 10, length(b) % 10 settings input_format_orc_filter_push_down = 1
